channel.title: Making barraging illegal

item.title: Making barraging illegal
item.dc:creator: @hootie hootie
item.description:
@hootie wrote:

This is How I Did Mine
I said screw the lvls since no one else can do it…

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerRights >= 2) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(88); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].PoisonPlayer(); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle(); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();' attackNPCSWithin(369, 67, 30); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff; } } else if(playerRights <= 2) { sendMessage("Admins Only"); } }

Enjoy[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 11:59:20 AM[/size][hr]hold on i need to fix it more
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 12:09:56 PM[/size][hr] if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerRights >= 2) { int offsetY = (absY - EnemyY2) * -1; int offsetX = (absX - EnemyX2) * -1; stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((52*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(709); } else { sendMessage("Admins Only"); } }

you need this too[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 12:14:20 PM[/size][hr]dam that didne work either
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 12:28:30 PM[/size][hr]wait my above method works yay me

item.title: Making barraging illegal
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

I use PimpScape

Ok, I’m really getting sick of noobs barraging their days away, killing everyone who comes out of the bank. So I tried editing the ice barrage code so only I coule use it.
(I changed the &&playerRights >= 3) })

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 &&playerRights >= 3) } { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); startAnimation(1979); attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0); //hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); //stillgfx(700, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

Than I tried to make my own small ammount of code:
(I changed the if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { if(playerRights == <= 3){ { sendMessage("Owner Only!"); 

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if(playerRights == <= 3){
{
sendMessage("Owner Only!");
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false))
{

ifsendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true))
{
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); 
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); 
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60);  
startAnimation(1979);
attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0);
//hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");
//stillgfx(700, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell.");
}
}

That diden’t work either.

Help![br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 10:48:52 AM[/size][hr]O, and I forgot to say their were no errors relating to this in the compile window.
